title: Microsoft's firmware update for the Surface Pro 4 and Book brings 'Windows Hello'
text:
Microsoft's firmware update for the Surface Pro 4 and Book brings 'Windows Hello' 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Microsoft has released a firmware update for the Surface Pro 4 and Surface Book that will enable 'Windows Hello'. 'Hello' will allow users t... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
